title: Life Extension Strontium Caps 750 mg - Bone Health Supplement - Supports Bone Tissue Density & Promotes Healthy Bone Aging – Non-GMO, Gluten-Free – 90 Vegetarian Capsules
features: “S” IS FOR STRONTIUM & STRONG BONES - Strontium is a trace mineral that has been used in Europe for years to promote healthy bone aging. Why? Because strontium has similar chemical properties at the molecular level as found in calcium. And we’re pretty sure you already know how beneficial calcium is for healthy, strong bones and teeth.

NOT JUST THE STRENGTH, BUT THE ACTUAL DENSITY OF YOUR BONES - Strontium concentrates in the skeletal system, where it begins to play a crucial role in supporting your bone tissue density. Strontium Caps are part of a daily nutrient regimen for individuals who are looking for comprehensive bone health support.

FOR THOSE SEEKING BONE HEALTH SUPPORT – Our experts formulated our Strontium Caps with ingredients that are based on the latest research. The suggested daily serving of 3 vegetarian capsules supplies 750 mg of this vital trace mineral should be taken by those in need of advanced bone health support.

INGREDIENTS MATTER - Sourced using only the finest raw ingredients with the purity and potency your body deserves. The majority of our products are non-GMO, gluten-free and manufactured in the USA—and a Certificate of Analysis is available for every product we produce.

LIVE YOUR HEALTHIEST LIFE - For over 40 years, we’ve been developing advanced, effective formulas made with the highest standards and based on the latest scientific findings. We believe the answers to a healthier, richer life are within reach, and that rigorous scientific research is the path to get us there. Our formulations are created using the ingredients and dosages used in the studies that inspired them, ensuring that maximum bioavailability and efficacy is achieved.
description: Strontium has been used in Europe for years to promote healthy bone aging. Strontium is a trace mineral whose metabolism is closely linked to that of calcium, as they have similar chemical properties at the molecular level. Strontium concentrates in the skeletal system, where it plays a key role in supporting bone tissue density. The suggested daily serving of 3 vegetarian capsules supplies 750 mg of this vital trace mineral. Strontium Caps is part of a daily nutrient regimen for individuals in need of especially comprehensive bone health support.
